titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4481) to provide for the closing and realigning of certain military installations during a certain period.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-751.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 388 - 2 (Record Vote No: 220).

bill.summary: 7/6/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4481 (military installation closures and realignments).
